name: zubridge-electron-example
description: An application demonstrating all approaches of using zubridge with Electron
author: goosewobbler

scripts.clean: pnpm clean:output && pnpm dlx shx rm -rf ./node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml
scripts.typecheck: pnpm run typecheck:node && pnpm run typecheck:web
scripts.dev:ui:basic: cross-env ZUBRIDGE_MODE=basic ELECTRON_ENTRY=./out-basic/main/index.js WATCH_UI=true electron-vite dev
scripts.dev:ui:redux: cross-env ZUBRIDGE_MODE=redux ELECTRON_ENTRY=./out-redux/main/index.js WATCH_UI=true electron-vite dev
scripts.dev:ui:custom: cross-env ZUBRIDGE_MODE=custom ELECTRON_ENTRY=./out-custom/main/index.js WATCH_UI=true electron-vite dev
scripts.build: pnpm run typecheck && pnpm build:basic && pnpm build:handlers && pnpm build:reducers && pnpm build:redux && pnpm build:custom
scripts.build:basic: cross-env ZUBRIDGE_MODE=basic electron-vite build && cross-env ZUBRIDGE_MODE=basic electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.ts
scripts.build:handlers: cross-env ZUBRIDGE_MODE=handlers electron-vite build && cross-env ZUBRIDGE_MODE=handlers electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.ts
scripts.build:reducers: cross-env ZUBRIDGE_MODE=reducers electron-vite build && cross-env ZUBRIDGE_MODE=reducers electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.ts
scripts.build:redux: cross-env ZUBRIDGE_MODE=redux electron-vite build && cross-env ZUBRIDGE_MODE=redux electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.ts
scripts.build:custom: cross-env ZUBRIDGE_MODE=custom electron-vite build && cross-env ZUBRIDGE_MODE=custom electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.ts
